credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: Study of "Fortune"
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
medium: Black crayon, white chalk, on purple paper
description: The lower section of a woman's figure, a long section of drapery swirling about her and extending beneath her feet. Signed and inscribed lower right: "E. Vedder / study for Fortune / owned by Charles Keck."
name: Drawing
